title: Peninah's Passion
description: Alex Longdon is a disgraced financial advisor, his comfortable life has crashed around his ears and the only reason he has to continue is his young and beautiful Kenyan wife Peninah. Pursued by a cartel bent on their elimination, running from a dangerous knowledge, they find themselves chased across two continents facing mortal danger, deceit and temptation. For Peninah this is the beginning of a journey of self-discovery as she slowly begins to understand her own desires and fetishes, for Alex the journey is an awakening as he begins to understand his wifeâ€™s deepest needs. Maybe they can save their love, but can they save themselves!
author: Andy  Lang
